title: .valueOf()
description: The `.valueOf()` JS method returns the primitive value of the `Date` object, which is the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.
content: The method that returns the primitive value of a specified date as the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC (the Unix Epoch). It provides a numeric representation of the date and time.
